21.heading: Tremebunda, Doña.

21.author: [No author]
21.series: Condorito) p. 44 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550

22.heading: Tremebunda, Doña.
22.title: "Opinión"
22.author: [No author]
22.series: Condorito) p. 20 in Condorito Gigante, no. 550

Stuart, the troubled studio head, was attacked and slain by a crazed motorcycle clan; Chimeer was kidnapped by two SS Men, and Axle is believed to be the pope's envoy."

169.heading: Trevor, Steve.
169.title: "Wonder Woman, the World's Most Dangerous Human!"
169.author: Harry G
169.appears_in: Peter, art ; Robert Kanigher, script. 8 p. in Wonder Woman, no. 95 (Jan. 1958).
notes: Summary: Earth launches its first weather satellite; Wonder Woman rescues Steve Trevor during a hydrogen bomb test but becomes dangerously radioactive herself; alien invaders take over the weather satellite and Wonder Woman on her way into exile defeats them with the help of a passing comet and meteor; the rays making up the comet's tail cure the radiation sickness.
Data from Gene Reed and Lou Mougin, via Grand Comic-Book Database.
